thread.title: WhatsApp Beta Update Finally Brings Support for Windows 10 Mobile
thread.title_full: WhatsApp Beta Update Finally Brings Support for Windows 10 Mobile - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: WhatsApp Beta Update Finally Brings Support for Windows 10 Mobile
text: WhatsApp was, is, and will continue to be one of the top mobile messengers out there, and with a new version of Microsoft’s smartphone platform just around the corner, the developing team appears to be hard at work to make sure their app has full support. So it shouldn’t come as a big a surprise that a new update for the beta version finally brings full support for Windows 10 Mobile, which means that end users should get this functionality as soon as the next smartphone ope... »
